nodes.text: During a skirmish, the mercenary group the Aurodium Sword defended their client, a Sullustan executive, from a squad of industrial assassins. Three of the Aurodium Sword members who participated in the firefight were the rogue ARC trooper known as Muzzle, the Wookiee Snoova, and another Wookiee. An Imperial intelligence agent obtained an image of the skirmish and sent it along with a report on Aurodium Sword to the Galactic Empire. Imperial Commander Maximillian Seerdon of the Imperial Security Bureau placed both the report and image in a dossier on underworld figures he compiled in 0 ABY.
